nodes.text: The Tertiary Kesmere system was located in the Raioballo sector in the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It contained the cloudy, storm-wracked world Tertiary Kesmere. Between 4 ABY and 12 ABY, the Tertiary Kesmere system was situated within the boundaries of the Pentastar Alignment.
The Tertiary Kesmere system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square L-4.
